item.title: Git Alias - The shorthand power | Git in-use
item.description: Different from alias bound to the bash-liked shell of the system. Git aliases are more like a shorter command to be typed command started with git <alias>. Aliases also have the scope limited to local project or global configuration. The configurations would be stored at .gitconfig. Alias creation and usage1# CREATE AN ALIAS 2$ git config --global alias.<alias-name> "<git command>" 3 4# USE AN ALIAS 5$ git <alias-name> <more optional arguments> Helpful AliasesCommonly used shorthand commands (to be continuously added…):
